examples.example: 在每一个夜晚，我都忍不住心底的思念，轻轻地说一句我想你。

translate.english: At every night, I can't help but miss from the bottom of my heart, and gently say I miss you.

examples.example: 每当看到美丽的风景，我都会在心里默默地说我想你。

translate.english: Whenever I see the beautiful scenery, I will silently say in my heart that I miss you.

examples.example: 无论相隔多远，我的心中都时常念叨着我想你。

translate.english: No matter how far apart, I always miss you in my heart.
